sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.ivda.activity.deserializer

Class PolymorphicDeserializer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonDeserializer<T>
      • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.ivda.activity.deserializer.CustomDeserializer<T>
        • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.ivda.activity.deserializer.PolymorphicDeserializer<T>

  • @ThreadSafe
public class PolymorphicDeserializer<T>
extends CustomDeserializer<T>
    Created by Seky on 20. 7. 2014.

    Deserialize polymorfed objects by specific keys. Like a URI

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonDeserializer

        com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonDeserializer.None

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PolymorphicDeserializer(java.lang.Class<T> baseClass, java.lang.String attribute) 
      PolymorphicDeserializer(java.lang.Class<T> aClass, java.lang.String jsonAttribute, boolean tryLongestSubsequence)
      When system can not find class for http://perconik.gratex.com/useractivity/event/web/tab/switchto it will try search for nearest object like a http://perconik.gratex.com/useractivity/event/web/tab and it will map for this class.

      • pushSubTypesOf

        public void pushSubTypesOf(java.lang.String packageName)
        Call object's method to get specific object's value and compare it with JSON attribute. Object's value is stored in the attribute with same name as JSON attribute name.
        Parameters:
        packageName -
